title: Drawing, "Three Pendants", ca. 1870
signed: Partial signature in graphite, lower left: Salvatori
inscribed: Inscribed above each pendant in graphite: 1; 2; 3
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Each pendant has in the center a big oval diamond. No. 1 has the general shape of an escutcheon, no. 3 of a cross, and no. 2 has semicircles above and below which are connected by squares. No. 2 has a small metal pendant.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Three Pendants", ca. 1870.
ca. 1870. Graphite on cardboard. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6295.
